column2: "Sɛ ɔbanyin bi fa ɔbaa na ɔwar no
column5: osiandɛ oehu no ho enyitodze bi ntsi a
column8: na ongya no kwan ma omfi ne fie nkɔ."

column2: "Na sɛ ofi ne fie kɔ a
column3: ɔnkɔ nkɛyɛ ɔbanyin fofor bi ne yer."

column2: "Na sɛ kun fofor no so tan no
column3: na ɔkyerɛw awargyaa krataa ma no
column5: na ogya no kwan ma ofi ne fie kɔ; anaa sɛ ekyir kun no a ɔfaa no yɛɛ ne yer no wu a;"

column2: "mma no kun a odzi kan no a ogyaa no kwan no
column3: mmfa no nnyɛ ne yer bio
column4: wɔ no ho fi a ogui no ekyir no; na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze wɔ EWURADZE enyim: na mma nnyɛ ma asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no do nnyɛ bɔn."

column2: "Sɛ ɔbanyin bi hyia yer fofor a
column4: nkyii so mma wɔmmfa edwuma biara nnto no do: ondzi noho wɔ fie afrenhyia
column5: na ɔmma ne yer a oehyia no no akomatɔmu."

column2: "Mma nyimpa bi nngye ewuyambo anaa ewuyambobaa a ɔda do no ahoba: nna tserɛ ɔregye nyimpa no nkwa dɛ ahoba."
"Sɛ wohu nyimpa a owia no nuanom Israel mu bi
column4: anaa ɔtɔn no a; ɔno owifo no nwu; ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu."

column2: "Hwɛ yie wɔ kwata owuyar ho
column3: na aadwen do yie ayɛ dɛ mbrɛ asɔfo Levifo no bɛkyerɛkyerɛ hom no nyi nara: dɛ mbrɛ mehyɛɛ hɔn no
column4: dɛmara so na hom ndwen do nyɛ."

column2: "Kaa dza EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze yɛɛ Miriam wɔ ɔkwan no mu aber a hom fi Egypt reba no."
"Sɛ ebɔ wo nyɛnko bosa biara a
column3: mma nnkɔ ne fie nnkɛgye n’ahobadze."

column2: "Abow enyim na gyina
column3: na nyimpa a ebɔ no bosa no mfa ahobadze no mfir edzi mbrɛ wo wɔ abow enyim."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔyɛ ohianyi a
"sɛ wi kɔtɔ a
column3: fa ahobadze no san kɛma no
column5: na onhyira wo: na ɔnyɛ tsenenee mma wo wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Mma nnhyɛ ɔpaanyi a ɔyɛ ɔbɔbɔnyi nye ohianyi no do
column3: sɛ ofi wo nuanom mu o
column4: ofi w’ahɔhoe a wɔwɔ w’asaase do wɔ wo nkuropon mu o:"

column2: "ne da mu na ma no n’apaadze
column3: nkyii so mma wi nnkɔtɔ do; osiandɛ ɔyɛ ɔbɔbɔnyi
column4: na ɔdze n’akoma esi do: amma ɔaannka mu ammfrɛ EWURADZE enntsia wo

column2: "Mma wonnku egyanom wɔ mba hɔn bɔn ntsi
column3: nkyii so mma wonnku mba wɔ egyanom hɔn bɔn ntsi: nyimpa biara nankasa no bɔn ntsi na wonku no."

column2: "Mma nndan ɔhɔho
column3: anaa egyanka n’atsɛmbu enyi na nngye okunafo akataho ahoba:"

column2: "na kaa dɛ eyɛɛ akowaa wɔ Egypt
column3: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn poon wo wɔ hɔ: dɛm ntsi na merehyɛ wo dɛ yɛ iyi yi."

column2: "Sɛ itwa wo ndɔbaa wɔ wo haban mu
column3: na wo werɛ fir ifi bi wɔ haban no mu a
column4: mma nnsan nnkɔ nnkɛfa mmba: ma ɔnyɛ ɔhɔho
column6: nye okunafo dze: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn eehyira wo wɔ wo nsaano edwuma nyinara mu."

column2: "Sɛ eporow wo ngodua a
column3: mma nnkɔ n’abaw no do bio: ma dza aka no nyɛ ɔhɔho

column2: "Sɛ etsew wo wenyin ture mu esikyireamba a
column3: mma nnkedzi w’ekyir mpɛpɛw: ma ɔnyɛ ɔhɔho

column2: "Na kaa dɛ eyɛɛ akowaa wɔ Egypt asaase do: dɛm ntsi na merehyɛ wo dɛ yɛ iyi yi."
